title: Reminder that Galio is the most OP champion in the game
body:
He has a monopoly on the illegal mana buff market. 
https://66.media.tumblr.com/0fa0ad455733c7a87cdaa36c2a879e5e/tumblr_nm763ewavX1tvo2c3o1_500.gif

replies.body: ROFL best POST EVER
http://i.imgur.com/RjhgRow.gif?noredirect
I'm just impressed there's a mean for that image of  Galio.

{{champion:84}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:157}} 
Welcome to ionia
{{champion:43}} "You get used to not being loved."

{{champion:16}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:134}} 

{{champion:43}} even though shes literally the grand duchess of ionia

One of these things is not like the others.
One of these things just doesn't belong.
One of these things is not like the others.
Can you figure it out before I finish this song?

Uh... URGOT.

{{champion:6}} You're not wrong. I don't belong anywhere...
Akali's the only chick. Got it
Hey don't ignore Kennen like that
Not this bull again. Kennen is a boy dammit. It even sounds like a boy's name, and his voice sounds more like a boy than a girl.
kennen's gender is still a mysery
Not at all. They refer to Kennen as a "he" in every point that they ever speak of him.
phreak referred to Teemo as "her" in his champion spotlight, doesn't mean he is female.
everyone looks so calm and kennens just there like "I WILL MURDER UR FAMILY"
well his old default skin looks normal and calm, for some reason they decided to add lighting in his eyes.
What's a Galio?

> [{quoted}](name=TridentSPQR,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pvjA8Z2d,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-06-15T04:39:36.310+0000)
>
> What's a Galio?

A boat I think.
http://www.ilfracombe-hotels-holidays.co.uk/ilfracombe_photos/ilfracombe-galleon.GIF
Nah, that's a galleon or galley, I think I heard somewhere that "Galio" is an area of space like the Milky Way

No wait.. I think it is a measurement of milk.

http://ohhdeertrade.com/media/catalog/product/cache/7/image/1200x/040ec09b1e35df139433887a97daa66f/i/-/i-feel-pretty12.jpg

Nu, that's a gallon, I think Bill Nye said galio is on the periodic table of elements...

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRkrsuoU1f_ZVHqEThiBbQ4nRWhg4DlgJ7fcX0iiNWhTQqkFcDf

nah that's Galium, might be a Deceptacon though

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/villains/images/7/7c/Galvatron_(Generation_1).jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120301225629

nah fam, that's Galvatron, Could be a giant planet eating monster though

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/marveldatabase/images/9/92/Galactus_(Earth-TRN177).jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110416002346

If I may doubt you, sir, I think you meant Galactus.
Pretty sure it's the 16th century's well known italian philosopher
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/d4/Justus_Sustermans_-_Portrait_of_Galileo_Galilei,_1636.jpg

Maybe you are mixing things up with Galileo.
It must be some kind of melon developed in Israel.

I'm so sorry to disagree with you, but seems like you mistook it with "Galia"
I suggest it might be a town in Georgia.
I do believe that you confused it with a town in Georgia called "Gainesville". I believe it is actually a champion that was recently released in League of Legends.

Ohhh, you mean this guy?
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Yorick_0.jpg
Yea I think that's the one.
i don't remember him being announced, was it recently?

While It may be easily mistaken for such good sir, I do believe that is Galileo

Though I do have reason to believe it's a futuristic game of diplomacy

http://www.galciv1.com/expans44.jpg

Once again, I am deeply sorry to disagree with you, great sir, but I believe you meant 
"Galactic Civilizations".
I think it might be an area in the european part of Turkey.
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/92/W_Beach_Helles_Gallipoli.jpg

Hm, was an interesting thought. But I do believe you meant "Galilee."

I think it might be that Laughing Fish was correct, though it's specifically a boat of Dutch variety.  

http://www.ulf-neundorfer.de/stedinger%20compagnie/galiot-pauline.jpg
http://66.media.tumblr.com/e21d4cc22cad08c6486901b932aa7d24/tumblr_nm1noyk5YT1rmcgo1o1_r2_500.gif
What we don't know is that's actually a secret Mafia boss skin, and his biggest black market  item is mana potions :p
Secret? Look at that mans face. That is the face of a man who makes offers people cannot refuse.

{{champion:50}}: Galio, I was too mana hungry and need some mana. Can I have a potion?

{{champion:3}}: You come to me on the day of my ADC's buff, decide not to buy a {{item:2033}} and you expect me to give you a mana potion?

{{champion:50}}: Pls, I'm going to die here at this rate :(

{{champion:3}}  http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view5/2588939/godfather-o.gif
IS THAT A FREAKING MANA POTION?!?
Is that..... the Mythical Mana Potion?!
http://img.pandawhale.com/83332-imgur-the-simple-image-sharer-rGBi.gif
Could have used that awesome YES gif , shame...

More awesome than Heisenberg? I think not.
http://www.breakingbadgifs.com/gifs/gifs/heisenberg/breaking-bad-gif-heisenberg-4772952.gif
He likes to hire lucian a lot, have you seen how many mana pots he holds whenever he backs (Hired gun lucian back animation)

Not to mention Lux's breastplate is abnormally sized given her Star Guardian skin.

Almost as if a certain spherical, mana-filled flask can be smuggled in it.
http://i.imgur.com/5Do9qcP.png
Not true. There is still one at the red side shop also.

Who is Galio

nvm he is the scientist

thats Galileo
